item.title: Building Os Full Procedure(Click to view full procedure)
item.description: Write Your Own 64-bit Operating System Kernel From Scratch You can find full code on my Git repo https://github.com/riazumerkheil/os. Prerequisites A text editor such as VS Code. Docker for creating our build-environment. Qemu for emulating our operating system. Remember to add Qemu to the path so that you can access it from your command-line. (Windows instructions here) Setup Build an image for our build-environment: docker build buildenv -t myos-buildenv Build Enter build environment:
